creator: dosyas@yandex.ru
text:
If we comment line 
#LoadModule dav_svn_module modules/mod_dav_svn.so
Apache starts normaly, but if we uncoment it and restart Apache:

[Fri Nov 26 18:48:36 2004] [notice] Parent: Created child process 1868
[Fri Nov 26 18:48:36 2004] [notice] Child 1868: Child process is running
[Fri Nov 26 18:48:36 2004] [notice] Child 1868: Acquired the start mutex.
[Fri Nov 26 18:48:36 2004] [notice] Child 1868: Starting 250 worker threads.
[Fri Nov 26 18:49:24 2004] [notice] Parent: Received restart signal -- 
Restarting the server.
[Fri Nov 26 18:49:24 2004] [notice] Child 1868: Exit event signaled. Child 
process is ending.
[Fri Nov 26 18:49:24 2004] [warn] (OS 995)The I/O operation has been aborted 
because of either a thread exit or an application request.  : winnt_accept: 
Asynchronous AcceptEx failed.
[Fri Nov 26 18:49:25 2004] [notice] Child 1868: Released the start mutex
[Fri Nov 26 18:49:26 2004] [notice] Child 1868: Waiting for 250 worker threads 
to exit.
[Fri Nov 26 18:49:26 2004] [notice] Child 1868: All worker threads have exited.
[Fri Nov 26 18:49:26 2004] [notice] Child 1868: Child process is exiting

Further attempts to start don't help: Apache exits without writing anything to 
error.log
But starting Apache from console still works! And mod_dav_svn also works!
Dependencies are satisfied. Subversion 1.1.1
